key_risks: Intense competition from established and emerging EV motorcycle manufacturers
High price point limiting mass-market adoption
Supply chain vulnerabilities, particularly for critical components like batteries and semiconductors
Dependence on Harley-Davidson affecting brand identity and market positioning
Operational challenges due to outsourcing to Harley-Davidson
controversies: Perceived dependency on Harley-Davidson despite becoming a standalone entity
Operational efficiency concerns due to outsourcing arrangements
environmental_issues: Sustainability commitments and investments in reducing environmental impact
social_issues: Potential impact of high pricing on accessibility and mass-market adoption
governance_issues: Strategic independence concerns due to outsourcing to Harley-Davidson
